snippet: Such statutes, pushed by Republican lawmakers, must be recognized as the discriminatory measures they are.
abstract: Editorial contends the voter ID laws that Republicans are battling to preserve in lead-up to midterm elections must be recognized as the discriminatory measures they are; urges Supreme Court justices to rule definitively that such laws are antidemocratic if and when court assesses their constitutionality in the future.
lead_paragraph: Such statutes, pushed by Republican lawmakers, must be recognized as the discriminatory measures they are.

headline.main: The Big Lie Behind Voter ID Laws
headline.print_headline: The Big Lie Behind Voter ID Laws
